body:
All Versions

  • Security: Allow administrator user to grant or revoke administrative privileges for other users
  • Security: Allow administrator user to assign project permissions while creating and updating users
  • Security: Add new profile page that allows users to change password
  • Profile: Add profile image to the left of description text as a quick visual identification of feature
  • User Profile: Improved instructions for adding or changing profile picture
  • Help: Improved Help navigation and content
  • Announcement messages do not close automatically
